page.title: 03THE RECTOR'S DAY,CRADLEY
page.content: On Wednesday 8th.May 1985,the Rector got up and had breakfast,then he came down to Cradley School to take our morning assembly.He usually reads a piece from the Bible and then we sing a hymn. After this he went to Colwall to a meeting of church people.After this he went to Worcester at 1.30p.m. to the crematorium for a funeral service.Then he went to the hospital to visit two people from this parish. Then he went home for tea.He will eat almost anything,having been in the Merchant Navy.Then he went to a V.E. Day service as it was the 40th anniversary of V.E. Day.Then he went on a home visit to discuss Baptism. Most of all he cares about people.He hopes that in the future all the churches will unite as one.
